item.title: Atomic Habits - Clear, James
item.description: Metadata Author: [[Clear, James]] Full Title: Atomic Habits Category: #books Highlights changes that seem small and unimportant at first will compound into remarkable results if you’re willing to stick with them for years.

item.title: How to Take Smart Notes- Ahrens, Sönke
item.description: Metadata Author: [[Ahrens, Sönke]] Full Title: How to Take Smart Notes: One Simple Technique to Boost Writing, Learning and Thinking – for Students, Academics and Nonfiction Book Writers Category: #books Highlights Writing plays such a central role in learning, studying and research that it is surprising how little we think about it.

item.title: How to Win Friends and Influence People - Carnegie, Dale
item.description: Metadata Author: [[Carnegie, Dale]] Full Title: How to Win Friends and Influence People Category: #books Highlights Only knowledge that is used sticks in your mind.

item.title: On Writing Well - Zinsser, William
item.description: ![[notes/images/onwritingwell.jpg|200]] Highlights But, as always, there’s a catch. Nobody told all the new computer writers that the essence of writing is rewriting.

item.title: Planting - Piet Oudolf and Noel Kingsbury
item.description: Metadata Author: [[Piet Oudolf and Noel Kingsbury]] Full Title: Planting Category: #books Highlights PLANTING – THE BIG PICTURE GROUPING PLANTS The discipline needed to restrict the numbers of varieties necessary for matrix mixes to work is perhaps too tight for many locations, where a wide variety of plants are needed to engage the onlooker
